Sentencas: The ejector-based recirculation system has a promising application in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with the advantages of no parasitic power, small size, lightweight, and easy maintenance compared with the pump-driven system.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: However, it is difficult for the ejector to satisfy the requirements of high backpressure and the highentrainment ratio at the same time in the SOFC system.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: To overcome the problems, a heat exchanger enhanced SOFC anode recirculation system is proposed for improving the performance of the ejector whose primary flow is heated by the second flow through a heat exchanger in the high-pressure ratio of 1.08.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: The flow characteristic and performance of the ejector are investigated with the variation of the inlet temperatures by computer fluid dynamics (CFD) and the experiment.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: The results show that the entrainment ratio omega and the steam to carbon ratio (STCR) are improved respectively from 2.37 to 7.73 and 0.74 to 2.11 at the pressure ratio of 1.08 compared with the condition without the heat transfer.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the current density and power of the SOFC are increased from 414.68 A/m2 to 552.20 A/m2 and 34.84 kW to 45.88 kW, and the voltage of the SOFC has practically maintained at 0.88 V.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: The improvement of the SOFC power is up to 30 %.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system

Sentencas: The exchanger enhanced ejector recirculation system provides an effective way for improving the performance of the SOFC system.
Titulo: High performance ejector enhanced by heat exchanger in solid oxide fuel cell anode recirculation system
